price: (Allah,) yer sizi yırğalamasın deyə, onun üstündə möhkəm dağlar, habelə, düzgün istiqamət götürəsiniz deyə, çaylar və yollar yaratdı.
arabic: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alqā fī al-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa-anhāran wasubulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
